title: Retrieve all products without filter
description: Verify that the API returns all products when no category filter is applied

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/products without query parameters
Verify response status is 200 OK
Verify response contains a products array including products from all categories

title: Retrieve products filtered by valid category
description: Verify that the API returns products filtered by each valid category: t-shirts, shirts, jeans, jackets

steps.description: For each valid category, send GET request to /api/products?category={category}
Verify response status is 200 OK
Verify all returned products belong to the requested category

title: Retrieve products with invalid category filter
description: Verify API behavior when an invalid category filter is provided in the query

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/products?category=invalidcategory
Verify response status code indicates error or returns empty products list

title: User registration with valid data
description: Verify user registration succeeds with valid name, email, and password

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/auth/register with valid name, unique email, and password
Verify response status is 200 OK
Verify response contains an authentication token and user object with name and email

title: User registration with missing required fields
description: Verify user registration fails with missing name, email, or password

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/auth/register with missing one or more required fields
Verify response status is 400 Bad Request

title: User registration with already registered email
description: Verify system rejects registration when email is already registered

steps.description: Register a user with a valid email
Attempt to register again using the same email
Verify second response status is 400 Bad Request with appropriate error message

title: User login with correct credentials
description: Verify user can login successfully with valid email and password

steps.description: Register user to ensure account exists
Send POST request to /api/auth/login with correct email and password
Verify response status is 200 OK
Verify response contains a valid token and user info

title: User login with incorrect credentials
description: Verify login fails with invalid email or password

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/auth/login with valid email and incorrect password
Verify response status is 401 Unauthorized
Send POST request to /api/auth/login with unregistered email
Verify response status is 401 Unauthorized

title: Add items to cart, update quantities and remove items
description: Verify cart operations: adding products with size and quantity, updating quantity, removing items, and total recalculation

steps.description: Login as authenticated user
Add a product with size and quantity to cart
Verify the cart contains the item with correct quantity and calculated subtotal
Update the quantity of an existing cart item
Verify the cart updates quantities and recalculates totals correctly
Remove an item from the cart
Verify the cart no longer contains the removed item and totals update accordingly

title: Order creation with valid cart items
description: Verify creating an order from valid cart items returns order ID and total

steps.description: Login as user
Add valid products with sizes and quantities to cart
Send POST request to /api/orders with cart items
Verify response status is 200 OK
Verify response contains new orderId and total amount

title: Order creation with empty or invalid cart
description: Verify order creation fails when cart is empty or contains invalid product IDs

steps.description: Attempt to create order with empty items array
Verify response status is 400 Bad Request
Attempt to create order with invalid product IDs
Verify response status is 400 Bad Request

title: Create Razorpay order with valid order ID
description: Verify creating Razorpay payment order for an existing order returns correct payment details

steps.description: Create a valid order
Send POST request to /api/payment/create-razorpay-order with valid orderId
Verify response status is 200 OK and contains Razorpay order details including key, amount, currency, razorpayOrderId, and orderId

title: Create Razorpay order with missing or processed order ID
description: Verify the API rejects missing orderId and orders that are already processed

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/payment/create-razorpay-order without orderId
Verify response status is 400 Bad Request
Send POST request with orderId of an order already processed
Verify response status is 400 Bad Request

title: Create Razorpay order with non-existing order ID
description: Verify API returns 404 Not Found for razorpay order creation with invalid order ID

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/payment/create-razorpay-order with non-existent orderId
Verify response status is 404 Not Found

title: Verify Razorpay payment with valid signature
description: Verify payment signature validation and order status update works with valid payment data

steps.description: Create Razorpay order and obtain payment IDs and signature
Send POST request to /api/payment/verify with valid orderId, razorpay_order_id, razorpay_payment_id, and razorpay_signature
Verify response status is 200 OK and success is true with confirmation message and orderId

title: Verify Razorpay payment with missing or invalid signature data
description: Verify API rejects payment verification requests missing required fields or with invalid signatures

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/payment/verify with missing required payment fields
Verify response status is 400 Bad Request
Send POST request with invalid signature
Verify response status is 400 Bad Request

title: Verify Razorpay payment with non-existing order
description: Verify API returns 404 Not Found when verifying payment for non-existent order ID

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/payment/verify with invalid orderId
Verify response status is 404 Not Found

title: Confirm Cash on Delivery (COD) order
description: Verify confirming a COD order updates order status and returns success

steps.description: Create COD order
Send POST request to /api/orders/{id}/cod-confirm with valid order ID
Verify response status is 200 OK with success true, message, and orderId

title: Confirm COD order already processed
description: Verify API returns 400 Bad Request when attempting to confirm COD order that is already processed

steps.description: Confirm a COD order
Attempt to confirm the same COD order again
Verify response status is 400 Bad Request with appropriate error message

title: Confirm COD order with invalid order ID
description: Verify API returns 404 Not Found when confirming COD order with non-existent ID

steps.description: Send POST to /api/orders/{id}/cod-confirm with invalid order ID
Verify response status is 404 Not Found

title: User order history retrieval with authentication
description: Verify that authenticated user can retrieve only their orders with accurate status

steps.description: Login as user
Send GET request to /api/orders with valid authentication token
Verify response status is 200 OK
Verify response contains only orders belonging to the authenticated user

title: User order history retrieval unauthorized access
description: Verify that unauthenticated requests to order history are rejected

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/orders without authentication token
Verify response status is 401 Unauthorized

title: Newsletter subscription with valid email
description: Verify subscribing to newsletter with valid email succeeds

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/newsletter/subscribe with valid email
Verify response status is 200 OK and subscription success flag is true

title: Newsletter subscription with invalid or missing email
description: Verify API rejects subscription requests with missing or badly formatted emails

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/newsletter/subscribe with empty or invalid email format
Verify response status is 400 Bad Request

title: Legacy checkout API succeeds with valid cart items
description: Verify legacy checkout endpoint processes valid items and returns order ID and total

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/checkout with valid items array
Verify response status is 200 OK
Verify response contains orderId and total amount

title: Legacy checkout API fails with empty cart
description: Verify legacy checkout API returns error when items array is empty

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/checkout with empty items array
Verify response status is 400 Bad Request

title: Admin access control for protected routes
description: Verify that admin routes for product and order management require admin role and reject unauthorized users

steps.description: Attempt to access admin product and order management endpoints without authentication
Verify response status is 401 Unauthorized or 403 Forbidden
Login as non-admin user and access same endpoints
Verify response status is 403 Forbidden
Login as admin user and access endpoints
Verify response status is 200 OK and functionalities are accessible

title: Admin product management CRUD operations
description: Verify admin can create, retrieve, update, and delete products

steps.description: Login as admin user
Create a new product with all required fields
Verify product creation successful and product details returned
Retrieve product details by ID
Verify the product details match the created product
Update product information such as price or title
Verify product details updated successfully
Delete the product
Verify product is removed and no longer retrievable

title: Admin order status and inventory management
description: Verify admin can update order statuses and manage inventory appropriately

steps.description: Login as admin user
Retrieve an existing order
Update order status (e.g., from pending to shipped)
Verify order status update is successful
Adjust product inventory related to orders
Verify inventory reflects changes accordingly

title: UI responsiveness and error display
description: Verify UI behaves responsively across devices and displays error messages gracefully for bad inputs or failures

steps.description: Access the site on desktop, tablet, and mobile viewports
Verify layout adapts correctly and remains usable
Trigger validation errors like submitting empty registration or login forms
Verify error messages are displayed clearly and UI does not crash
Try accessing admin UI section as unauthorized user
Verify admin routes redirect or show access denied
